    • Constructor Detail

      • PPFramedChart

        public PPFramedChart(double x,
                     double y,
                     double width,
                     double height)
        Creates a new PPFramedChart object with the specified bounds.
        Parameters:
        x - The left side of the bounding box
        y - The top side of the bounding box
        width - The width of the bounding box
        height - The height of the bounding box

    • Method Detail

      • setLimits

        public void setLimits(double xmin,
                      double xmax,
                      double ymin,
                      double ymax)
        Sets the limits of the graph area in units appropriate to the application. Note that the coordinate system inside the graph is Cartesian, with the origin in the lower left corner.
        Parameters:
        xmin - The minimum x value at the left
        xmax - The maximum x value at the right
        ymin - The minimum y value at the bottom
        ymax - The maximum y value at the top

      • createBackground

        public PPShape createBackground()
        Creates the shape corresponding to the background inside the frame. With no parameter, createBackground creates a white background.
        Returns:
        The background shape

      • createBackground

        public PPShape createBackground(Color color)
        Creates the background shape using the specified color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the background
        Returns:
        The background shape

      • createBorder

        public PPShape createBorder()
        Creates a border frame for the graph. This shape is typically added last to ensure that the data does not overwrite the border.
        Returns:
        The shape representing the border

      • createXGridLine

        public PPShape createXGridLine(double x)
        Creates a vertical grid line at the specified x coordinate.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the grid line
        Returns:
        The shape representing the border

      • createYGridLine

        public PPShape createYGridLine(double y)
        Creates a horizontal grid line at the specified y coordinate.
        Parameters:
        y - The y coordinate of the grid line
        Returns:
        The shape representing the border

        public void setGridWeight(double weight)

        Parameters:
        weight - The weight of the grid lines in the chart

        Returns:
        The corresponding pixel coordinate

        public double getGraphY(double y)
